title: LF plat+ players for a serious ranked team
body:
Need players for a new ranked team aiming to achieve high play/diamond by the end of the season. Also will potentially by competing in tournaments/competitions.

Requirements:
- Plat+
- Need to be able most nights
- Be committed to the team
- Need to be able to Skype
- Want to continuously improve
- Can take criticism and improve

If this sounds like you drop your ign in below with your..
Rank:
Role:
Availability:
Champion Pool:

replies.body:
Rank: Plat 1-2
Role: Mid/Top/Supp/Jg prefs (i used to play mid almost all the time but now i just fill) my adc is average
Availability: I'm usually available everyday/night 
Champ Pool: I can play almost every champ which fit into the roles mentioned above. 
My comfort picks for each role is:
Top: Tahm Kench/Renekton
Jungle: Udyr/Kha
Mid: Every midlane possible
Support: Every support possible
Adc: Cait

Rank: Plat 2-3
Role: ADC main. If I had to sub for someone, I have high experience in supp. (since duo lane and stuff)
Availability: At the moment, most weeknights and weekend days are good. Once i finish uni (November) i'll be free all the time
Champ Pool: Every adc really. Mains are Jinx > Ashe > Ezreal > Draven

Be dedicated to the team. Not to join just to quit a few days later, be able to play most of the time (eg certain nights) , be in the team for the long run not just for the ward skins or end of season rewards although those are benefits

Hit me up yo
Diamond 5 (on my smurf which is this account)
adc/mid
Nights every night
I can play every adc, jinx main
mid: Yasuo, Zed, Orianna, Ahri Viktor

Rank: Plat 3
Role: top or mid pref, can do anything though
Availability: every night apart from Tuesday or Thursday and the odd Monday 
Champion pool: only going to list 5 for each because I can play every meta champ and non meta champ I'll also play anything the team needs, I've been playing since season 2 so can pretty much play anyone. 
Top: Gnar, Mao, Hec, Naut and Shen.
Mid: Azir, Viktor, Ff, Varus, Yasuo
